name: Die in the Dungeon
description:
///IMPORTANT///

The game is currently very hard to beat. We didn't have enough time to polish correctly the stronger enemies, however it is possible to achieve. The boss is located on the 20th floor, if you manage to beat her be sure to post a screenshot here!

No frog was ever this brave!

Find the best dice combination to conquest the 20 floor dungeon in this RPG turn based game!

Will you be able to overcome this challenge?

---

CONTROLS

Just Mouse

---

THEME IMPLEMENTATION

Our game implements the "stronger together" theme with the different combinations you can do between the dices and how they interact with their magic.

---

Code by  @galbix  and @yomellamoyorch

Art by @alartsf

Music by @gonzamol8
